item.title: Applicant Eligibility
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Global high-school students from grades 8th - 12th who are interested in research, project-building and are driven by curiosity and innovation are welcome to apply. We don’t consider your grades or mark sheets as yardsticks for eligibility - we want to know about you, your ideas and goals!

The post Applicant Eligibility appeared first on Learn with leaders.
item.content:encoded:
Global high-school students from grades 8th – 12th who are interested in research, project-building and are driven by curiosity and innovation are welcome to apply.

We don’t consider your grades or mark sheets as yardsticks for eligibility – we want to know about you, your ideas and goals!

The post Applicant Eligibility appeared first on Learn with leaders.
